pageContext.claim: “And I think that, obviously, the sanctions and tariffs [on Turkey] were going to be very biting. I'm glad we don't have to do it. ”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims he was “very tough on Turkey,” but prominent members disagreed. Sens. Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.) and Chris Van Hollen (D-Md.) introduced a bill that would trigger more aggressive sanctions on Turkey.
